word_mean_info__list.difference: 正式用词，多指报刊上的报道，强调对情况经过调查或审核后作出的详尽叙述，具有一定权威性。
普通用词，不如report正式，侧重对亲身经历或目睹之事所作的书面或口头的报道或叙述。
指把已发生的事件。情况和现状说清楚。
着重以特殊的知识、经验来解释难理解的事情。
说明某事物如何符合自然法则或逻辑。
含义广，最普通用词，指把某事向原来不了解、不清楚的人解释明白、说清楚等。
多指用实例或插图、图表加以说明。

word_group.brief_definition: 作出满意说明；提供；构成；解释, 说明；占...(数量/比例)
银行账户；银行往来账；银行存款
据说；根据各种流传的说法

挂账, (先付小部分款额的)赊账

为了你自己打算, 自负其责
往来账户；活期存款账户
客户账目经理；业务经理

bilingual.source: I save the rest in my bank account.
bilingual.target: 我把剩下的钱存进我的银行账户。

bilingual.source: This account has higher interest than others.
bilingual.target: 这个账户的利息比其他账户高。

bilingual.source: What is the account name for this bank account?
bilingual.target: 这个银行账户的户名是什么？

bilingual.source: Please log in to your account first.
I need to register a new account.
bilingual.target: 我需要注册一个新账户。

bilingual.source: Who is the payee for this account?
bilingual.target: 这个账户的受款人是谁？
他的银行账户余额是尼尔。

bilingual.source: We need to set up a new account.
bilingual.target: 我们需要创建一个新的账户。

bilingual.source: I opened a new account at HSBC.
bilingual.target: 我在汇丰银行开了一个新账户。

bilingual.source: I want to cancel my membership account.
bilingual.target: 我想注销我的会员账户。

list.abstract: account（ [əˈkaʊnt]），英语单词，作名词用，为报道；记述；账。作动词用，为认为；看作；报账。短语搭配有take into account（考虑；顾及）。例句为“By taking its quality into account.（考虑到它的质量）”。 account相关近义词有interpretation、result in、count等。

yingyinNormal.en: I've just spotted new activity on an old email account that Morris had before he went to prison.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我刚刚发现一个老电邮账户有动静，这是莫里斯进监狱之前的账户。

yingyinNormal.en: There was an anonymous cash deposit into your savings account yesterday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有笔匿名现金存款昨天汇入了你的账户。

yingyinNormal.en: You think I like having 50 dollars taken out of my bank account every month?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你以为我喜欢每个月账户被扣50元？

yingyinNormal.en: David, I also spoke to security at Venmo. To find out more about the account Margot sent the $2,500 to. Do they know who it belonged to? It belonged to Margot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大卫，我和Venmo小额转账的安保人员也谈过了。想了解更多有关玛戈转账的账户的详细资料。他们知道这个账户是谁的了吗？这个账户属于玛戈。

yingyinNormal.en: Make your jokes, but my date started a savings account for me. Did yours?
yingyinNormal.zh: 随便吐槽， 但我的伴帮我开了储蓄账户。你的伴有吗？

yingyinNormal.en: So, that's just the rough idea. If you want to see more sketches, just check out my ClosetCloud account.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基本想法就是以上这些，如果想要看更多草图，可以去我的"橱柜云"账户。

yingyinNormal.en: Using the information on her account, we traced her to a Kerchick's Diner 10 miles outside Pittsburgh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过她账户中的信息，我们追踪到一家叫科奇克的餐馆位于距匹兹堡十英里外。

yingyinNormal.en: I think he pissed himself. Good job, Z. We're in his account. So he really doesn't know he's in the OASIS?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得他吓尿了。干得好，Z 。我们进入他的账户了。他真的不知道自己还在绿洲吗？

yingyinNormal.en: So, here it is. When you get back home, Michael Lawler will give you access to a bank account that contains enough to give you a new beginning.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听好了，你回家之后迈克尔·劳勒会给你一个银行账户，里面的钱足够让你开始全新的生活了。

yingyinNormal.en: Congratulations. We got the Breitling account.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恭喜，我们搞定了布赖特林。

yingyinNormal.en: My expenses account for 46.9% of my after-tax income.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的日常开支占我税后收入的46.9%。

yingyinNormal.en: I am just a bookkeeper. I tally. I account. I serve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就是个簿记员，我只计数，计算，为大汗服务。

yingyinNormal.en: If I could keep my Gmail account, I'd be okay with that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要还能保留我的谷歌邮箱号，我无所谓啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you know I'm 29. I mean who needs a savings account.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我都29了，还存什么钱？

yingyinNormal.en: Indeed you're mistaken. I cannot account for this honour at all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你错了，我完全不明白你这次怎么这样看得起我们，会到这种地方来。

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh, somebody took pictures and uploaded them to their Flickr account.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有人拍了照还上传到了Flickr上。

yingyinNormal.en: And there's 500 extra dollars in my account. Satan's minions at work again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的户头多了五百元。撤旦的奴才又开始活跃了。

yingyinNormal.en: You called the police because someone hacked your World of Warcraft account?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你居然就因为有人黑掉了你的魔兽世界账号就报警了？

yingyinNormal.en: Why should you believe my account? Because I'm telling the truth. Of course you are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们凭什么相信我的说法？因为我说的是实话。那是当然。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't care. Overruled. Why should we believe your account of what happened to Ms. Todd?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我才不管，反对无效。我们凭什么相信，你为托德小姐作的证词？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 有责任；可说明性；责任制；有义务
adj. 应负责任的；负有责任的；可解释的；可理解的

word_family.mean: n. 报道；记述；账；账目；账户；赊购账；重要性；会计科；演奏；账单

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 构成；解释；说明；占...(数量或比例)
据说；根据各种流传的说法

examination_example.sentence: In March, for the first time, wind and solar power <highlight>accounted</highlight> for more than 10 percent of the power generated in the US.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年3月，风能和太阳能首次占美国发电量的10%以上。

examination_example.sentence: They now <highlight>account</highlight> for more than half of new power sources going on line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们现在占了超过一半的线上新电源。

examination_example.sentence: Conversely, if homework matters, it should <highlight>account</highlight> for a significant portion of the grade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，如果家庭作业很重要，它应该占成绩的很大一部分。

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement by which a body holds funds on behalf of a client or supplies goods or services to the client on credit

examination_example.sentence: Many, like the Fundamental Physics Prize, are funded from the telephone-number-sized bank <highlight>accounts</highlight> of Internet entrepreneurs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多项目，比如基础物理奖，都是由互联网企业家的电话号码大小的银行账户资助的。

examination_example.sentence: Dishonest persons might be able to access bank <highlight>accounts</highlight> in electronic payments systems and steal from someone else's <highlight>accounts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不诚实的人可能会进入电子支付系统中的银行账户，并从别人的账户中窃取信息。

examination_example.sentence: It takes several days before a check is cashed and funds are withdrawn from the issuer's <highlight>account</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 支票兑现以及资金从发行人账户中提取需要几天时间。

examination_example.sentence: Weighing every other week allows me to observe and <highlight>account</highlight> for any significant weight changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每隔一周称重一次，让我可以观察并计算任何显著的体重变化。

examination_example.sentence: The link between happiness and investment generally held even after <highlight>accounting</highlight> for these things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使考虑到这些因素，幸福和投资之间的联系仍然存在。

examination_example.sentence: Their analysis ruled out the possibility that it was firms' political influence that <highlight>accounted</highlight> for the leniency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的分析排除了企业的政治影响导致宽大处理的可能性。

examination_example.sentence: The agreement took far too little <highlight>account</highlight> of the patients' rights and their expectations of privacy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该协议对病人的权利和他们对隐私的期望考虑得太少了。

examination_example.sentence: By all <highlight>accounts</highlight> he was a freethinking person, and a courageous one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大家都说他是一个思想自由、勇敢的人。

examination_example.sentence: An important paper will be cited more often than one of small <highlight>account</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一篇重要的论文比一篇无足轻重的论文更常被引用。

sense_info_list.en: a report of an event or experience

examination_example.sentence: The author gives a factual <highlight>account</highlight> of it and discusses its consequences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者对此进行了事实陈述，并讨论了其后果。

examination_example.sentence: As "consumers" we must shop sustainably, rather than as "citizens" hold our governments and industries to <highlight>account</highlight> to push for real systemic change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们应该作为“消费者”，以可持续的方式购物，而不是作为“公民”，让我们的政府和行业承担责任，推动真正的系统性变革。

sense_info_list.en: a record or statement of financial expenditure and receipts relating to a particular period or purpose;the department of a company that deals with financial accounts
consider or regard in a specified way

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 有责任；可说明性；责任制；有义务
adj. 应负责任的；负有责任的；可解释的；可理解的

word_family.mean: n. 报道；记述；账；账目；账户；赊购账；重要性；会计科；演奏；账单

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 作出满意说明；提供；构成；解释；说明；占...(数量/比例)

examination_example.sentence: They argued that her causal-sounding claims rested on correlational data, and that she had not adequately <highlight>accounted</highlight> for other potential causal factors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认为，她的因果关系主张基于相关数据，并且她没有充分说明其他潜在的因果关系的原因。

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement by which a body holds funds on behalf of a client or supplies goods or services to the client on credit

examination_example.sentence: I just got the idea a few months ago after posting some holiday photos on my social media <highlight>accounts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几个月前，在我的社交媒体账户上发布了一些节日照片后，我萌生了这个想法。

examination_example.sentence: It includes <highlight>accounting</highlight> for any piece of debris they plan to release over 5mm that might stay in orbit for 25 years or more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这包括考虑他们计划释放的5mm以上可能在轨道上停留25年或更长时间的碎片。

sense_info_list.en: a record or statement of financial expenditure and receipts relating to a particular period or purpose

examination_example.sentence: Tom went frantic trying to find copies of last year's <highlight>accounts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 汤姆拼命寻找去年账目的复印件。

sense_info_list.en: a statement or exposition of reasons, causes, or motives; a reason for an action
a report of an event or experience

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 说明某事物如何符合自然法则或逻辑。
指把已发生的事件。情况和现状说清楚。
含义广, 最普通用词, 指把某事向原来不了解、不清楚的人解释明白、说清楚等。
多指用实例或插图、图表加以说明。
着重以特殊的知识、经验来解释难理解的事情。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 有责任；可说明性；责任制；有义务
adj. 应负责任的；负有责任的；可解释的；可理解的

word_family.mean: n. 报道；记述；账；账目；账户；赊购账；重要性；会计科；演奏；账单

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 帐户余额；账户平衡；科目余额

examination_example.sentence: By taking its quality into <highlight>account</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到它的质量。

examination_example.sentence: Taking into <highlight>account</highlight> economic need beyond that absolute measure, the Institute for Policy Studies found that 140 million people are poor or low-income.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到这一绝对指标之外的经济需求，政策研究所发现1.4亿人是穷人或低收入者。

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement by which a body holds funds on behalf of a client or supplies goods or services to the client on credit

examination_example.sentence: You are likely aware of what time it is, how old you are, your checking <highlight>account</highlight> balance, your weight and so on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能很清楚现在几点、你的年龄、你的活期存款账户余额，你的体重等等。

examination_example.sentence: I don't think it matters whether you take it out to the bank or transfer from your bank <highlight>account</highlight> to the seller's bank <highlight>account</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是你把钱从银行提出来还是从你的银行账户转账给卖家，我感觉都不重要。

sense_info_list.en: a report of an event or experience

examination_example.sentence: Firsthand <highlight>accounts</highlight> seem to indicate a small wave of people bringing piles of donation bags to used goods stores.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据第一手资料显示，有一小批人把一堆堆的捐赠袋带到二手商店。

sense_info_list.en: a statement or exposition of reasons; causes; or motives; a reason for an action

examination_example.sentence: On this <highlight>account</highlight>, I suggest that activities of this kind be held once a semester.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，我建议这类活动每学期举办一次。

sense_info_list.en: the department of a company that deals with financial accounts
consider or regard in a specified way

examination_example.sentence: The results held true even after the scientists <highlight>accounted</highlight> for the participants'overall health status.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使在科学家考虑了受试者的整体健康状况后，这一结果仍然成立。

examination_example.sentence: Europe has only around 200 languages and Asia and the Pacific perhaps 3,200, of which Papua New Guinea alone <highlight>accounts</highlight> for over 800.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 欧洲只有大约200种语言；美洲大约有1000种；非洲2400种；亚太地区大约有3200种。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Parents can put pocket money directly into their child's bank <highlight>account</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母可以把零花钱直接存入孩子的银行账户。

examination_example.sentence: She opened a lunch <highlight>account</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她开了一个午餐账户。

examination_example.sentence: After following the <highlight>account</highlight>, users can start talking with her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关注这个账号后，用户就可以开始和她聊天了。

examination_example.sentence: Chinese companies topped the list for most 5G SEPs applications， <highlight>accounting</highlight> for 34 percent of the world's total．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 截至 2019年4月底，中国企业在通信系统方面的5G标准基本专利应用中名列前茅。
